card.text: If you casting a creature spell would cause a triggered ability of a permanent you control to trigger, that ability triggers an additional time. As an additional cost to cast creature spells, you may pay {R}. If you do, that spell can't be countered and it gains haste.

card.name: Makeshift Justice
card.text: Target creature you control gets +X/+0 and gains first strike until end of turn, where X is the number of spells you've cast this turn.

card.name: Volwood Warder
card.text: Muster — Whenever you cast a creature spell, you gain 1 life. If this is the second time this ability resolved this turn, draw a card. If this is the third time this ability resolved this turn, put two +1/+1 counters on this creature.

card.name: Planar Archives
card.text: {2}, {T}, Exile a card from your graveyard: Draw a card. {5}, {T}, Exile this artifact: Take an extra turn after this one. Activate only as a sorcery and only if there are five or more cards exiled with this artifact.

card.name: Divine Liberation
card.text: Untap and gain control of target nonland permanent until end of turn. It gains haste until end of turn. At the beginning of the next end step, exile it.

card.name: Boundless Coffers
card.text: This land enters tapped. When this land enters, surveil 1. {T}: Add {U} or {R}.

card.name: Hidden Corridor
card.text: This land enters tapped. When this land enters, surveil 1. {T}: Add {R} or {W}.

card.name: Weapon VLR
card.text: Equipped creature gets +1/+1. Equip {2}

card.name: Siurne's Betrayal
card.text: Choose up to two target creature cards with mana value 3 or less in your graveyard. Return one to the battlefield and the other to your hand.
